Package grails.plugin.cache.ehcache

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EhcacheBlockingCache
    Ehcache-based implementation of BlockingCache.
    EhcacheCacheConfiguration
    Ehcache-based implementation of CacheConfiguration.
    GrailsEhcacheCache
    Extends the default implementation to return GrailsValueWrapper instances instead of SimpleValueWrapper, to include the Ehcache Element instance.
    GrailsEhcacheCacheManager
    Based on org.springframework.cache.ehcache.EhCacheCacheManager; reworked to return GrailsEhcacheCache instances.
    GrailsEhCacheManagerFactoryBean
    Based on org.springframework.cache.ehcache.EhCacheManagerFactoryBean.
    GrailsEhCacheManagerFactoryBean.ReloadableCacheManager
